text: Oni sprashivayut tebya, kak im raskhodovat' [svoye dostoyaniye]. Skazhi: "Na chto by vy ni tratili [svoye] dobroye delo, prezhde vsego dolzhno [pozabotit'sya, daby] ostalos' roditelyam, blizkim rodstvennikam, sirotam, bednyakam, putnikam. I kakoye by dobro vy ni sovershili, Allakh vedayet ob etom
